1571780.name: Techno Prank
1571780.description:
"Head of Section Two, report to Office 314 immediately!"

Techno Prank is an immersive simulator of a techno prankster’s life — a chaotic blend of creativity, absurdity, and total audio mayhem.

Find phone numbers, call people using pre-recorded lines from others, record their shocked replies, and reuse them to trick the next poor soul. Dig into your victims’ secrets, uncover weird mysteries, and turn your mischief into a full-blown show for your growing audience.

Talk Like You Belong

You’ll meet dozens of unique characters who aren't too happy to hear from strangers at first.

Use familiar voices to earn their trust, take advantage of duty or emotion, and push them deeper into surreal conversations. Or just sit back and enjoy the beautiful chaos you’ve created.

You can throw in any recorded phrase — from anyone, at any time. Even use your target’s own voice! But be careful — if something feels off, they’ll hang up and ghost you forever.

The Art of the Prank

Stream your calls live in-game to build your fanbase, grab donations, and climb the viral ladder. Become the most notorious prankster on the net… unless the police catch wind of what you're doing.

You’ll start small — cheap food, random gigs, and terrible sleep. But it’s all worth it for your creative rise to chaos stardom.

Check the prankster community daily for new phrases and fresh targets. Who knows who’s next on the list?

The more phrases you collect, the more combinations you can create — and the deeper your conversations will go. Absurdity, freedom, and improvisation are your tools. The rest? That’s up to your twisted imagination.
1571780.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 乌克兰语
